{{TOC|right}}
A game event [[Tag (Java Edition)|tag]] is a group of [[game event]]s. See below for the use of each tag.

== List of tags ==
=== allay_can_listen ===
[[Allay]]s can listen and react to game events in this tag.

{{tag_list|allay_can_listen|type=game_event
|note_block_play
}}

=== ignore_vibrations_sneaking ===
Game events in this tag are ignored by [[sculk sensor]]s if the source entity is sneaking.

{{tag_list|ignore_vibrations_sneaking|type=game_event
|hit_ground
|projectile_shoot
|step
|swim
|item_interact_start
|item_interact_finish
}}

=== shrieker_can_listen ===
Game events in this tag trigger [[sculk shrieker]]s.

{{tag_list|shrieker_can_listen|type=game_event
|sculk_sensor_tendrils_clicking
}}
